resources.string: We are here as your pathfinder!
Make A Call Anytime from Anywhere
You can search for places nearby or within your selected location. The app will display all related location
The contact information of all stores and other registered utilities will be shared with you. You can easily make a query anytime
If you want to register your place or something you know, You are most welcome
We will be always there for you. All you need to do is just have this App
